subject: UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: With all the attention on Chelsea’s new forward, Fernando Torres, and with Didier Drogba brooding on the bench, it was Anelka who cut through the frigid Copenhagen air.
snippet: With all the attention on Chelsea’s new forward, Fernando Torres, and with Didier Drogba brooding on the bench, it was Anelka who cut through the frigid Copenhagen air.
